settings.code:
<style>
    .panel {
        display: none;
    }
    .panel.active {
        display: block;
    }
    .pin-spacer {
        background-color: #000;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__page_video {
        display: block;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__m_page_video {
        display: none;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__m_page_video .t4s-btn-icon use,
    #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__page_video .t4s-btn-icon use {
        display: none;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__m_page_video .t4s-btn-icon,
    #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__page_video .t4s-btn-icon {
        background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/play_normal.svg?v=1693532989') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
        color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
    }

    #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__m_page_video .t4s-btn.t4s-btn-effect-fade:hover .t4s-btn-icon {
        background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/play.svg?v=1691737328') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__page_video .t4s-btn.t4s-btn-effect-fade:hover .t4s-btn-icon {
        background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/play.svg?v=1691737328') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
    }

    @media (max-width:768px) {
        #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__page_video {
            display: none;
        }

        #shopify-section-template--19877598200151__m_page_video {
            display: block;
        }
    }

    .section_box {
        max-width: 1200px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding-top: 200px;
    }

    section {
        background-color: #000000;
    }

    section p {
        margin: 0;
    }

    /* Top Buy */
    .top_buy {
        position: absolute;
        top: 100px;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        z-index: 1000;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
    }

    .top_buy .top_content {
        max-width: 1280px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        padding: 13px 0;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content p {
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 20px;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        margin: 0;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth {
        position: relative;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span {
        font-size: 14px;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        margin-right: 40px;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 1;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span:hover {
        cursor: pointer;
        color: #D2D2D7;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span.active {
        color: #D2D2D7;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button>a {
        display: inline-block;
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 14px;
        color: #000000;
        padding: 5px 20px;
        background: #03F2A6;
        text-decoration: none;
        border-radius: 40px;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 1;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button>a:hover {
        background: #00cc88;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button:hover .shop_popup {
        opacity: 1;
        pointer-events: auto;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .shop_popup {
        position: absolute;
        right: 0;
        top: 30px;
        padding-top: 30px;
        pointer-events: none;
        opacity: 0;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box {
        width: 165px;
        background: #fff;
        border-radius: 12px;
        padding: 0 10px;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: flex-start;
        width: 100%;
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        line-height: 14px;
        color: #747476;
        padding: 5px 0;
        text-decoration: none;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a img {
        max-width: 26px;
        margin-right: 10px;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a:nth-child(1) {
        border-bottom: 1px solid #D2D2D7;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a:hover {
        color: #000000;
    }

    .top_50 {
        position: fixed;
        top: 0 !important;
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
        border-bottom: 1 solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
        animation: top-animeit .5s linear;
        z-index: 999;
    }

    @keyframes top-animeit {
        0% {
            transform: translateY(-100%);
        }

        100% {
            transform: translateY(0);
        }
    }

    .top_50 .top_content {
        border: none;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list {
        position: relative;
        height: 656px;
    }

    .section_1 .mobile_img_list {
        display: none;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list {
        position: absolute;
        border-radius: 8px;
        overflow: hidden;
        opacity: 0;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_1 {
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 360px;
        height: 220px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_2 {
        top: 0;
        left: 376px;
        width: 532px;
        height: 420px;
        transform: scale(2.5);
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_3 {
        top: 0;
        right: 0;
        width: 276px;
        height: 276px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_4 {
        bottom: 0;
        right: 0;
        width: 276px;
        height: 365px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_5 {
        bottom: 0;
        right: 292px;
        width: 417px;
        height: 220px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_6 {
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 475px;
        height: 220px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_7 {
        top: 236px;
        left: 0;
        width: 360px;
        height: 184px;
    }


    .section_2 .section_box h2 {
        font-size: 80px;
        line-height: 84px;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        margin-bottom: 50px;
    }


    .section_2 .section_box>p {
        font-size: 20px;
        color: #B0B0B0;
        line-height: 24px;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-bottom: 100px;
    }
    .section_2 .section_box>p span{
        color: #FFF;
    }
    .section_2 .section_2_bgc{
        position: relative;
    }
    .section_2 .section_2_bgc .text_box{
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
    }
    .section_2 .section_2_bgc .text_box div:nth-child(1){
        margin-bottom: 40px;
    }
    .section_2 .section_2_bgc .text_box span{
        color: #A1A1A6;
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-bottom: 16px;
    }
    .section_2 .section_2_bgc .text_box p{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 80px;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin: 0;
        line-height: 84px;
    }
    .section_3 .section_box h2 {
        font-size: 80px;
        line-height: 84px;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        margin: 0;
    }


    .section_3 .section_box>p {
        font-size: 20px;
        color: #B0B0B0;
        line-height: 24px;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin: 50px 0;
    }
    .section_3 .section_box>p span{
        color: #FFF;
    }
    .for_slider .section_box {
        padding: 0 0 200px 0;
    }

    .for_slider .for_tabs {
        margin-bottom: 66px;
    }
    .for_slider .for_tabs .swiper-wrapper{
        gap: 16px;
    }
    .for_slider .for_tabs .item {
        width: auto;
        padding: 14px 24px;
        font-size: 16px;
        color: #FFF;
        line-height: normal;
        font-weight: 600;
        cursor: pointer;
        border-radius: 50px;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.10);
    }
    .for_slider .for_img .item img{
        max-width: 820px;
    }
    .for_slider .for_tabs .item.swiper-slide-thumb-active,
    .for_slider .for_tabs .item:hover {
        background: #FFF;
        color: #000;
    }

    .for_slider .for_img {
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .for_slider .for_img .item {
        display: flex;
    }

    .for_slider .for_img .icon_list {
        display: flex;
        gap: 24px;
        align-items: center;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: space-evenly;
        align-content: center;
        background: #151517;
    }

    .for_slider .for_img .icon_list .list {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .for_slider .for_img .icon_list .list img {
        max-width: 84px;
    }

    .for_slider .for_img .icon_list .list .list_text {
        text-align: center;
    }

    .for_slider .for_img .icon_list .list p:nth-child(1){
        color: #848484;
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 18px;
        text-align: center;
        width: 125px;
    }
    .for_slider .for_img .icon_list .list p:nth-child(2){
        color: #F5F5F7;
        font-size: 24px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 28px;
        margin: 8px 0 0 0;
    }

    .for_slider .for_img .icon_list .list p:nth-child(2) span{
        font-size: 12px;
    }

    .section_4 .section_box h2 {
        font-size: 80px;
        line-height: 84px;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #FFFFFF;
    }

    .section_4 .section_box p:nth-child(2) {
        font-size: 32px;
        line-height: 28px;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        margin: 50px 0 40px 0;
    }

   
    .section_4 .section_box p:nth-child(3) {
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #B0B0B0;
        line-height: 24px;
        margin-bottom: 66px;
    }

    .section_4 .section_box p:nth-child(3) span {
        color: #FFFFFF;
    }
    .section_5 h2{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 80px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 84px;
        max-width: 900px;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box{
        padding-top: 120px;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left{
        max-width: 520px;
        width: 100%;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left>p:nth-child(1){
        color: #fff;
        font-size: 32px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 28px;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left>p:nth-child(2){
        font-size: 17px;
        font-weight: 500;
        line-height: 25px;
        color: #86868B;
        padding: 40px 0;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left>p:nth-child(2) span{
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #FFF;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left .text_box{
        padding: 40px 0 0 0;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left .text_box2{
        border-bottom: 1px solid #F5F5F7;
        padding: 0 0 40px 0;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left .text_box p:nth-child(1){
        font-size: 24px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 28px;
        background: linear-gradient(89deg, #03F2A6 1.56%, #2E5740 99.19%);
        background-clip: text;
        -webkit-background-clip: text;
        -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left .text_box p:nth-child(2){
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        font-size: 48px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 52px;
        background: linear-gradient(1deg, #72FFC4 3.39%, #096735 80.8%);
        background-clip: text;
        -webkit-background-clip: text;
        -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left .text_box p:nth-child(2) span{
        display: inline-block;
        width: 360px;
        height: 10px;
        border-radius: 14px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, #72FFC4 1.56%, #72FFC4 49.48%, #096735 99.99%);
        margin-right: 24px;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left .text_box p:nth-child(3){
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 17px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 21px;
        max-width: 250px;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left .text_box p:nth-child(4){
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 48px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: normal;
        height: 72px;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left .text_box p:nth-child(4) span{
        display: inline-block;
        width: 60px;
        height: 10px;
        border-radius: 14px;
        background: #4C4C4C;
        margin-right: 24px;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .left .text_box p:nth-child(5){
        color: #747476;
        font-size: 17px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 21px;
        max-width: 250px;
    }
    .section_5 .section_5_box .right{
        max-width: 620px;
        padding-left: 60px;
        width: 100%;
    }
    .section_6 h2{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 80px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 84px;
        margin-bottom: 110px;
        text-align: center;
    }
    .section_7 .section_box{
        padding-left: 270px;
    }
    .section_7 h2{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 80px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 84px;
    }
    
    .section_7 .section_box > p{
        color: #86868B;
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 24px;
        margin: 50px 0 65px 0;
        max-width: 500px;
    }
    .section_7 .section_box > p span{
        color:#F5F5F7;
    }
    .section_7 .ports_slider{
        position: relative;
        max-width: 640px;
    }
    .section_7 .swiper-wrapper{
        align-items: center;
    }
    .section_7 .item{
        width: 640px;
        opacity: .7;
    }
    .section_7 .item.swiper-slide-active{
        opacity: 1;
    }
    .section_7 .ports_slider p{
        color: #86868B;
        font-size: 17px;
        font-weight: 500;
        line-height: 25px;
        max-width: 640px;
        text-align: center;
        margin: 45px 0 0 0;
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-prev,.ports_slider .swiper-rtl .swiper-button-next{
        left: auto!important;
        right: -210px!important;
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-next,.ports_slider .swiper-rtl .swiper-button-prev{
        right: -290px!important;
        left: auto!important;
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-next,.ports_slider .swiper-button-prev{
        width: 54px;
        height: 54px;
        background: #333;
        border-radius: 50%;
        top: 97%!important;
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-next:after,.ports_slider .swiper-button-prev:after{
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: bold;
        color: #fff;
    }
    .section_8 .text_box{
        background: #121212;
        padding: 110px 0 110px 150px;
    }
    .section_8 .text_box h2{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 64px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 84px;
    }
    .section_8 .text_box img{
        margin: 110px 0 65px 0;
        max-width: 815px;
        width: 100%;
    }
    .section_8 .text_box p{
        color: #86868B;
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 24px;
        max-width: 725px;
    }
    .section_8 .text_box p span{
        color: #FFF;
    }
    .section_9{
        padding-bottom: 200px;
    }
    .section_9 .section_box{
        padding-top: 110px;
    }
    .section_9 .text_box{
        background: #121212;
    }
    .section_9 .text_box p{
        color: #86868B;
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 24px;
        max-width: 875px;
        padding: 65px 0 110px 150px;
    }
    .section_9 .text_box p span{
        color: #FFF;
    }
    /* specs */
    .specs {
        background: #000000;
        padding: 200px 0;
        position: absolute;
        top: 100px;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        z-index: 999;
    }

    .specs_box {
        max-width: 1280px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 0 15px;
    }

    .specs_box h2 {
        color: #FFF;
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 40px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 48px;
    }

    .specs_box picture img {
        padding: 80px 0 40px 0;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    }

    .specs_box ul {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul {
        display: flex;
        align-items: flex-start;
        justify-content: flex-start;
        padding: 40px 0;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li {
        width: 33%;
    }

    .specs_box .color ul li:nth-child(2) p,.specs_box .color ul li:nth-child(3) p {
        display: inline-block;
        width: 29px;
        height: 29px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        border: 1px solid #fff;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) {
        width: 34%;
    }

    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li {
        width: 34%;
    }
    .specs_box .item ul li p,
    .specs_box .item ul li span {
        font-size: 17px;
        color: #A1A1A6;
        max-width: 300px;
        word-wrap:break-word;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li div {
        padding-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li span {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #FFF;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) p {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 24px;
        color: #F5F5F7;
        max-width: 100%;
    }
    .specs_box .item a {
        display: inline-block;
        padding: 12px 36px;
        background: #FFFFFF;
        border-radius: 60px;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 16px;
        color: #000000;
        transition: .4s;
    }

    .specs_box .item a:hover {
        background: #03F2A6;
    }

    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li img {
        max-width: 320px;
        width: 100%;
    }
    .specs_box .item:last-child ul {
        border: none;
    }
    @media(max-width:767px) {
        .section_box {
            padding: 80px 20px 0 20px;
        }

        /* Top Buy */
        .top_buy {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
            z-index: 99999;
        }

        .top_buy .top_content {
            max-width: 100%;
            padding: 16px 0;
            margin: 0 18px;
        }

        .top_buy .top_content p {
            font-size: 18px;
            line-height: 18px;
        }

        .top_buy .top_content .rigth span {
            font-size: 12px;
            margin-right: 12px;
        }

        .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button>a {
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 12px;
            padding: 6px 15px;
        }

        .top_buy .top_content .rigth .shop_popup {
            top: 20px;
        }

        .section_1 .img_list {
            display: none;
        }

        .section_1 .mobile_img_list,
        .section_1 .mobile_img_list .list_box {
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .section_1 .mobile_img_list .list {
            border-radius: 4px;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .section_1 .mobile_img_list .row7_3,
        .section_1 .mobile_img_list .row3_7 {
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .section_2 .section_box h2 {
            font-size: 40px;
            line-height: 44px;
            margin: 0 0 35px 0;
        }


        .section_2 .section_box>p {
            font-size: 17px;
            line-height: 21px;
            margin: 0;
        }
        .section_2 .section_2_bgc img{
            padding: 50px 0 40px 0;
        }
        .section_2 .section_2_bgc .text_box{
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            gap: 30px;
        }
        .section_2 .section_2_bgc .text_box div:nth-child(1){
            margin: 0;
        }
        .section_2 .section_2_bgc .text_box span{
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 20px;
        }
        .section_2 .section_2_bgc .text_box p{
            font-size: 36px;
            line-height: 44px;
        }
        .section_3 {
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        .section_3 .section_box h2 {
            font-size: 40px;
            line-height: 44px;
        }

        .section_3 .section_box>p {
            font-size: 17px;
            line-height: 21px;
            margin: 35px 0;
        }
        .for_slider .for_tabs {
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }
        .for_slider .for_tabs .swiper-wrapper{
            gap: 8px;
        }
        .for_slider .for_tabs .item {
            padding: 10px 16px;
            font-size: 12px;
        }
        .for_slider .for_img .item img{
            max-width: 100%;
        }
        .for_slider .for_img .item{
            flex-direction: column;
        }
        .for_slider .for_img .icon_list {
            padding: 20px 20px 0 20px;
            gap: 0;
            height: 156px;

settings.text: Stromversorgung für alles, jederzeit und überall.

settings.code:
PowerRoam 2200

Überblick Specs
Kaufen

Schnellstes Aufladen im Warp-Speed

Zugang zur elektrischen Freiheit und Leistung ist nur so bequem wie eine Power Station, die schnell genug auflädt, um mit Ihnen Schritt zu halten. Mit der Ugreen PowerZip-Technologie lädt der Power Roam 2200W in etwa 50 Minuten auf 80% auf und ist in 1,5 Stunden voll aufgeladen.

Aufladen auf 80 %

50 Minuten

Voll aufgeladen

1,5 Stunden

Strom für 99 % der Geräte

Mit 2300 Watt Leistung und 2048 Wh Kapazität können Sie 99 %Ihrer Haushaltsgeräte aufladen. Mit 14 Steckdosen gibt es Platz für jedes Gerät, und odie U-Turbo-Technologie erhöht die Leistung auf 3500 W für Hochleistungsgeräte.

Home Backup

RVing & Outdoors

DIY

Desk Lamp
(20W)

88 Hrs

Laptop
(800W)

30 Times

TV
(200W)

8.7 Hrs

Hair Dryer
(1800W)

0.9 Hr

(20Wh)

88 Times

Mini Fridge
(60W)

29.3 Hrs

(200W)

8.7 Hrs

(1600W)

1 Hr

Angle Grinder
(800W)

2.1 Hrs

Electric Chainsaw
(1500W)

1.1 Hrs

Cutting Machine
(1800W)

0.9 Hrs

Lawnmower
(2200W)

0.7 Hr

Mehr Leistung für jeden Bedarf

Erweitern Sie die Kapazität von 2 kWh auf 12 kWh

Versechsfachen Sie die Kapazität eines Power Roam 2200mit bis zu 5 Erweiterungsbatterien*. Passen Sie Ihren Energiebedarf an IhreBedürfnisse an. Das einfache Plug-and-Play-Design bedeutet, dass Sie jetzt einfacher als je zuvor auf Notfälle vorbereitet sind.

*Ein PowerRoam 2200 kann mit bis zu 5 Erweiterungsbatterien (je 2kWh) verbunden werden, wodurch sich die Kapazität von 2kWh auf 12kWh erhöht. Die Erweiterungsbatterien müssen separat gekauft werden.

Langlebige 10-Jahres-LiFePO4-Batterie.

Haltbar, sicher, leicht

Die LiFeP04-Batteriechemie des Power Roam 2200 bietet 3000 Ladezyklen bei 80 % Batteriekapazität, 6-mal mehr Zyklen als der Branchendurchschnnitt.

*Diese Daten wurden unter Laborbedingungen erhoben. Die tatsächlichen Aufladezyklen können je nach den tatsächlichen Bedingungen variieren.

Ladezyklen

3,000

LFP-Batterien

600

Andere

Gerätelebensdauer

6X

Industrietaugliche elektronische Komponenten

Standard für andere Unterhaltungselektronik-Komponenter

Abnehmbarer Wagen

Mehr Anschlüsse,
Mehr Möglichkeiten

14 Steckdosen bieten Platz für jedes Gerät und einen Andersson-Anschluss für Wohnmobil- Stromgeräte.

*TT-30R Adapterkabel für Wohnmobile (nur US-Version)

"Kontrolle in Ihren Händen"

Laden Sie die UGREEN-App herunter, um Ihren PowerRoam 2200 überall zu steuern! Greifen Sie auf den Ruhemodus, den Energiesparmodus, die Kindersicherungsfunktionen und mehr zu.

Das Batteriemanagementsystem überwacht und verwaltet die Spannung, den Strom, die Temperatur und andere Parameter der Batterie in Echtzeit und bietet intelligenten Schutz, was eine starke Garantie für die sichere Stromnutzung ist.
